text:
Dears, quick reminder for tomorrow`s first “Light-sheet bite”!! The “Menu” is about “Multiview imaging”; hope you it is gonna be a useful and interactive meeting;
please bring all your questions and suggestions and see you hopefully tomorrow!

1) Multiview imaging and data fusion: a personal journey with BigStitcher and friends
Speaker: Alessandro Ciccarelli - The Francis Crick Institute (UK)
Date: Friday 28-01-2022 h15:00-16:00 (GMT)
Zoom Link:
<https://crick.zoom.us/j/66385131149?pwd=MlF2Q2srRnpXaXNLOC9zZWExRXJYUT09>
Meeting ID: 663 8513 1149
Passcode: 379234

Full details and next events here
<https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MwdHe-Pfd7UmVU89UCI_GR8YjTxaIMh-uuMeiISwa0g/edit>
